That's the first time you've called my name.\""},{"lineNumber":150346,"originalJapaneseLine":"「君は君の望みを果たす為、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You sacrifice many to fulfill your desires.\""},{"lineNumber":150347,"originalJapaneseLine":"　沢山の者を犠牲にしている」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You are sacrificing many.\""},{"lineNumber":150348,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この戦争にしろ、多くの死者が出る。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whether in this war or not, many will die.\""},{"lineNumber":150349,"originalJapaneseLine":"　君の指先一つで万という数が死ぬ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"With just a snap of your finger, tens of thousands can die.\""},{"lineNumber":150350,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そのことを君はどう思い、どう感じる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What do you think and feel about that?\""},{"lineNumber":150351,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあっ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":150352,"originalJapaneseLine":"「知るか、バーカ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"How should I know, idiot?\""},{"lineNumber":150353,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……そうか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I see.\""},{"lineNumber":150354,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh!?\""},{"lineNumber":150355,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケッセルリンクから噴き出した殺気が","translatedEnglishLine":"A murderous aura burst forth from Kesselring"},{"lineNumber":150356,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達に叩きつけられる。","translatedEnglishLine":"and slammed against Rance and the others."},{"lineNumber":150357,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴様のような、弱者――女性を踏みにじる者に","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I will not lose to someone like you who tramples on the weak—on women.\""},{"lineNumber":150358,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私は負けるわけにはいかない」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I simply cannot lose.\""},{"lineNumber":150359,"originalJapaneseLine":"「君にはファーレンの恨みもある……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You also bear the grudge of demon.\""},{"lineNumber":150363,"originalJapaneseLine":"「世の女を救うのはこの俺様だーッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I am the one who will save the women of this world!\""},{"lineNumber":150364,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……死ね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Die.\""},{"lineNumber":150365,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":150366,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふっ、その程度かね？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, is that all you've got?\""},{"lineNumber":150367,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh...\""},{"lineNumber":150368,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、カオス！　どうなってる！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, Chaos! What's going on?\""},{"lineNumber":150369,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちっとも弱ってないではないか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're not weakened at all!\""},{"lineNumber":150370,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええい、落ち着かんか、心の友！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, calm down, my dear friend!\""},{"lineNumber":150371,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんなことはない！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's not true!\""},{"lineNumber":150372,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よう見てみろ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Look closely!\""},{"lineNumber":150373,"originalJapaneseLine":"　夜の奴どころか、戦い始めに比べても、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Compared to the guy at night or even the start of the battle,\""},{"lineNumber":150374,"originalJapaneseLine":"　格段に覇気がなくなっている！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"he has significantly less fighting spirit!\""},{"lineNumber":150375,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうやら、やっこさん、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It seems, Yakko-san,"},{"lineNumber":150376,"originalJapaneseLine":"　昼間の戦いが長引けば長引くほど、","translatedEnglishLine":"the longer the daytime battle drags on,"},{"lineNumber":150377,"originalJapaneseLine":"　苦しくなっていくようだぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"the more difficult it becomes for him!\""},{"lineNumber":150378,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":150379,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん、どうやらそのようだな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, it appears so...\""},{"lineNumber":150380,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが、ゆっくり戦う余裕なんて","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But there's no time to fight leisurely"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こう外が騒がしくては眠れなくてね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I can't sleep with all this noise outside."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最後の最後までキザな奴め」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A conceited fellow to the very end."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、だが俺様の作戦勝ちだな！」
「女には甘いお前のこと！
絶対にひっかかると思っていたわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I knew you'd definitely fall for it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「救いを求める女性は無下に出来ん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I can't just dismiss a woman seeking help."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふっ、我ながら困ったものだと思うよ」
「ふんっ、格好つけおって！」
「で、おいカオス、
本当に弱体化してるんだろーな？」
「それは間違いない……」
「弱体化しても尚、心の友より強い場合は知らんよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you're still stronger than my dear friend even weakened, then I don't know."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この無責任野郎が！」
「ランスと言ったな」
「あん？　初めて俺の名を呼んだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? That's the first time you've called my name."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「君は君の望みを果たす為、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You sacrifice many to fulfill your desires."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 沢山の者を犠牲にしている」
「この戦争にしろ、多くの死者が出る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whether in this war or not, many will die."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 君の指先一つで万という数が死ぬ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "With just a snap of your finger, tens of thousands can die."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのことを君はどう思い、どう感じる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What do you think and feel about that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあっ？」
「知るか、バーカ」
「……そうか」
ケッセルリンクから噴き出した殺気が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A murderous aura burst forth from Kesselring

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達に叩きつけられる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and slammed against Rance and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴様のような、弱者――女性を踏みにじる者に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I will not lose to someone like you who tramples on the weak—on women."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は負けるわけにはいかない」
「君にはファーレンの恨みもある……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You also bear the grudge of Fahren..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「久しぶりに……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For the first time in a while..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒りに身を任せて戦わせてもらおう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: let me fight while giving in to my anger."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人の癖に生意気な」
「世の女を救うのはこの俺様だーッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I am the one who will save the women of this world!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっ、その程度かね？」
「おい、カオス！　どうなってる！
ちっとも弱ってないではないか！」
「ええい、落ち着かんか、心の友！
そんなことはない！」
「よう見てみろ！
夜の奴どころか、戦い始めに比べても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Compared to the guy at night or even the start of the battle,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 格段に覇気がなくなっている！」
「どうやら、やっこさん、
昼間の戦いが長引けば長引くほど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the longer the daytime battle drags on,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 苦しくなっていくようだぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the more difficult it becomes for him!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、どうやらそのようだな……」
「だが、ゆっくり戦う余裕なんて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But there's no time to fight leisurely

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
